      • isValidCastle

        public boolean isValidCastle​(int newRow,
                             int newCol,
                             Board board)
        Overrides generic ChessPiece method determining if move is a valid castle move.
        Overrides:
        isValidCastle in class ChessPiece
        Parameters:
        newRow - Row of destination coordinate.
        newCol - Column of destination coordinate.
        board - Relevant chess board.
        Returns:
        True if valid, false if not.

      • checkMove

        public boolean checkMove​(int newRow,
                         int newCol,
                         Board board)
        Checks if input coordinate is a valid chess move. Accounts for checks by calling testDupMove. Overrides generic ChessPiece method since Kings have to check for castles.
        Overrides:
        checkMove in class ChessPiece
        Parameters:
        newRow - The row of the new coordinate.
        newCol - The column of the new coordinate.
        board - The chess board.
        Returns:
        True if valid, false if not.

      • canAttack

        public boolean canAttack​(int newRow,
                         int newCol,
                         Board board)
        King implementation of abstract method to check if a move to the new coordinate is valid. Doesn't account for checks.
        Specified by:
        canAttack in class ChessPiece
        Parameters:
        newRow - The row of the new coordinate.
        newCol - The column of the new coordinate.
        board - The chess board.
        Returns:
        True if valid, false if not.
